name: standup
title: StandUp
description: A task tracker built into Raycast that syncs with external data stores
author: sanket_naik

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Add Task
commands.subtitle: Add a task and let's get to work
commands.description: Add a task to your daily agenda

commands.name: view-previous-tasks
commands.title: View Previous Tasks
commands.subtitle: View tasks from yesterday
commands.description: View tasks from the previous day

commands.name: view-specific-day-tasks
commands.title: View Tasks for Date
commands.subtitle: View tasks for a specific date
commands.description: Select a date to view tasks

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
